s: For US brands with a utility patent, Brand Registry offers a neutral evaluation process within the Report a Violation tool. The Amazon Patent Evaluation Express program brings in neutral third-party evaluators who are attorneys skilled in patent analysis, to decide whether an asserted utility patent is infringed. Start your brand’s Amazon.in journey by enrolling it in Amazon Brand Registry for free. After enrolling, you become eligible to activate a suite of brand-building tools and protection benefits. You can enroll your brand even if you don’t sell in the Amazon.in store.

t: Amazon Transparency: Counterfeit and brand protection
s: Transparency protects your brand and customers from counterfeits by ensuring that every unit shipped is authentic. Learn more about Amazon Transparency.
